product_name: Aqua Sphere Vista Clear Lens Swim Goggles
long_description: The Aqua Sphere Vista Clear Lens swim goggles provide great visibility to help you sight your line whether you're doing laps in the pool or competing in an open-water race. Durable polycarbonate lenses have an anti-fog and scratch-resistant coating; lenses provide 100% UVA and UVB protection. Leak-resistant silicone skirt around the lenses distributes pressure and prevents water from getting in; skirt provides extra coverage to keep cold water off your face. Lenses provide 180deg of visibility; clear lenses work especially well indoors or on overcast days outdoors. Quick-Fit Buckle(TM) allows easy adjustments while you're wearing the goggles. Silicone strap endures regular use. Latex free. The Aqua Sphere Vista Clear Lens swim goggles include a hard plastic case.
short_description: The Aqua Sphere Vista Clear Lens swim goggles provide great visibility to help you sight your line whether you're doing laps in the pool or competing in an open-water race.
